description: React component for admin document management page, including form handling, document listing, and actions like add, edit, delete, and view.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A React component displaying a message when no documents are available, with an action button.

methods.name: AdminDocuments
methods.description: Main React component for managing documents, including form for add/edit and table for listing.

methods.name: resetForm
methods.description: Resets the form state and editing ID.

methods.name: onEdit
methods.description: Loads a document into the form for editing based on its ID.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a document after user confirmation.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating a document.

methods.name: onView
methods.description: Navigates to the document view page.
